titleStmt.title: The copie of the publication of the trewse made betwene the most Cristien [sic] Kynge Henry second of that name themperour, and the kyng of Ingland his sonne published at Roan [sic] on Thursday the xx daye of Februarry [sic] ; translated out of Frenche into Inglishe.
Treaties, etc. 1556 Feb. 5
titleStmt.author: France.
Henry II, King of France, 1519-1559.
Spain. Treaties, etc, 1555 Feb. 5.

notesStmt.note: Place and publisher suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
